trans-unit.source: Control that is used to separate items in items controls.
trans-unit.target: 用于分隔项控件中的项的控件。

trans-unit.source: A Separator control draws a line, horizontal or vertical, between items in controls, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>.
trans-unit.target: Separator 控件绘制线条、 水平或垂直，在控件中，项之间如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Separator controls do not react to any keyboard, mouse, mouse wheel, or tablet input and cannot be enabled or selected.
trans-unit.target: Separator 控件不做出响应到任何键盘、 鼠标、 鼠标滚轮或平板电脑输入，无法启用或选择。

trans-unit.source: Separator controls inside <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> elements appear differently from Separator controls outside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>.
trans-unit.target: Separator 控件内<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>以不同的方式从外部<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> Separator 控件显示的元素</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> with a Separator, the control automatically applies the <xref:System.Windows.Style> identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>与一个分隔符，该控件会自动应用<xref:System.Windows.Style>由标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Style> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: Styles are placed in resource dictionaries and are searched for by their keys.
trans-unit.target: 样式放入资源字典，由其密钥来搜索。

trans-unit.source: To change the <xref:System.Windows.Style> of a Separator inside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, you must use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to create your new <xref:System.Windows.Style>.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改<xref:System.Windows.Style><xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>，则必须使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName>要创建你新<xref:System.Windows.Style>。</xref:System.Windows.Style>属性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>内的分隔符</xref:System.Windows.Style>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。
有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Separator"></xref> class.

Provides an appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SeparatorAutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] automation infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 提供适当<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SeparatorAutomationPeer"></xref>实现此控件，作为的一部分[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]自动化基础结构。
